name: milo-dog
description: A massively over-engineered webapp about a small sausage dog, Milo.
author: Nico Castro

scripts.run-test:api:dev: COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 yarn docker-compose:dev build apiTest && yarn docker-compose:dev run apiTest yarn test
scripts.run-test:api:prod: COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 yarn docker-compose:prod build apiTest && yarn docker-compose:prod run apiTest yarn test
scripts.run-test:app:dev: COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 yarn docker-compose:dev build appTest && yarn docker-compose:dev run appTest yarn test
scripts.start:dev: yarn docker-compose:dev config --services | grep -Ev 'docker-compose|Test' | COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 xargs yarn docker-compose:dev up -d
scripts.start:prod: yarn docker-compose:prod config --services | grep -Ev 'docker-compose|Test' | COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 xargs yarn docker-compose:prod up -d
